info.title: MaPS rest api 3.11.1-7.3 API specification
info.description:
Relative Path : maps/rest

Used HTTP Status codes:

  • 200 - OK, when request is executed successfully
  • 201 - When resource is created successfully with POST/PUT request
  • 400 - Parameters are missing or incorrect
  • 401 - Unauthorized request - not authenticated or expired token
  • 403 - User has no rights
  • 404 - Requested resource not found
  • 409 - Validation error
  • 500 - Unexpected server error

tags.name: BudgetLockRestApi
tags.description: Provide information for locked month and year budgets

post.description: __Available Since:__ 1.1

201.description: W2P attachments that are attached, filtered list of external ids that are attached

get.description: __Available Since:__ 1.1

Returns attachments of given Bill(Invoice)

READ_BILLS rights is checked instead of READ_ATTACHMENTS, because of the attachment is associated with bill

__Available Since:__ 3.9
__Available Since:__ 2.0

200.description: true if given attachment is used in content, false otherwise

get.description: __Available Since:__ 1.1

Returns attachments of given Invoice

READ_BILLS rights is checked instead of READ_ATTACHMENTS, because of the attachment is associated with invoice

__Available Since:__ 3.9

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: nodeId for which to get attachments

parameters.name: nodeId

Returns attachments of given Sunk Cost(PO)

READ_SUNK_COSTS rights is checked instead of READ_ATTACHMENTS, because of the attachment is associated with PO

Find timelines, tasks, attachments, individual planning
elements of the tree structure, invoices or sunkcosts in your marketing plan quickly and
easily.

get.description:
Get locked budget periods

__Available Since:__ 3.11

200.description: if year budget is locked and all locked months

get.description:
Returns if given period is locked for respective budget

__Available Since:__ 3.11

Return budget values of months, year, quarter, for planned,committed,actual,projected,remaining,mdf.

__Available Since:__ 1.0

parameters.name: calcByRef
parameters.description: false(default) - calculate by working currency, true - calculate by reference currency

parameters.name: round
parameters.description: false(default) - don't round values, true - round values

parameters.name: scale
parameters.description: available values NORMAL(default), THOUSANDS, MILLIONS, BILLIONS

put.description:
Edit PLANNED month budget of node for given year.The values are in cent(multiplied by 100). If you want to skip some months send null value, for example "planned":[1000, 10000, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null]
will add value 10 for the first month and 100 for the second

__Available Since:__ 1.0

Edit PLANNED year budget of node for given year. The values are in cent(multiplied by 100). For example to set 8000, send "planned":800000(multiplied by 100)

__Available Since:__ 1.0

get.description:
This method provides a list with information about all defined currencies.

__Available Since:__ 1.0

200.description: all currencies as List of CurrencyDTO

get.description: This method provides a list with information about all defined dimensions. Type Description - SELECTABLE_DIMENSION_TYPE Dimension is from type Single Selection. - M_SELECTABLE_DIMENSION_TYPE Dimension is from type Multi Selection. - MW_SELECTABLE_DIMENSION_TYPE Dimension is from type Weighted Multi Selection. - STRUCTURED_TEXT_DIMENSION_TYPE Dimension is from type Structured Text. - TEXT_DIMENSION_TYPE Dimension is from type Free Value. - CONTINUES_TEXT_DIMENSION_TYPE Dimension is from type Continues Text. __Available Since:__ 1.0

parameters.name: includeArchived
parameters.description: If it is required to include the archived dimensions into the response, then set this parameter to true.

application/json.example:
[ {
  "id" : 12345,
  "name" : "...",
  "info" : "...",
  "type" : "M_SELECTABLE_DIMENSION_TYPE",
  "readOnly" : true,
  "required" : true,
  "copyable" : true,
  "inheritable" : true,
  "archived" : true,
  "quickFilter" : true
} ]

get.description:
This method provides a list with information about specific dimension.

__Available Since:__ 1.0

application/json.example:
{
  "id" : 12345,
  "name" : "...",
  "info" : "...",
  "type" : "TEXT_DIMENSION_TYPE",
  "readOnly" : true,
  "required" : true,
  "copyable" : true,
  "inheritable" : true,
  "archived" : true,
  "quickFilter" : true
}

put.description:
This method updates a specific dimension. 
 - name (required) (string) Dimension name.
 - archived (optional) (boolean) true or false
 - copyable (optional) (boolean) true ro false
 - info (optional) (string) Additional information to dimension.
 - type (required) (string) Define the dimension type. Example values: SELECTABLE_DIMENSION_TYPE
 - inheritable (optional) (boolean) true or false
 - required (optional) (boolean) true or false
 - readOnly (optional) (boolean) true or false
__Available Since:__ 1.0

get.description:
This method provides a list with possible values for a given dimension.

Note that this method cannot be used for free text, continues text or structured dimensions.

__Available Since:__ 1.0

Return all dimension values for given node.

__Available Since:__ 1.0

parameters.name: dimensionType
parameters.description: not required, if presented then returns only values for the dimension type

get.description:
This method provides a list with objects containing weight and defined value for the
requested dimension of a given element.

__Available Since:__ 1.0

put.description:
Set dimension values for node. If node has already previously added values, they will be deleted.
To remove values should send empty array []. If the dimension is mark as 'required' and try to remove all values, http error with status 400 will be return.
To update 'selectable' type dimensions (single, multi) 'id' field will be used, for 'text' type dimensions (text, structured and continuous) 'value' field will be used.
For 'multi weight selectable' dimension type, fields 'id' and 'weight' will be used to update dimension. __Available Since:__ 1.0

requestBody.description: Should be an array of DimensionValue

This method creates a Marketing Planner Job task (so called managed task) for a given
element or links an already existing Job to a Marketing Planner task.

__Available Since:__ 1.0

parameters.name: createJob
parameters.description:
default is true. Set to true if job manager's job must be created.
Set this param to false and provide @param jobId to link job manager's job

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: job manager's job id. Must be provided for job linking if @param createJob is false

requestBody.description:
request body ManageTaskCreateDTO
- for property taskState see allowed values - "/task/statuses"
- for property markerType see allowed values  - "/marker"

put.description:
Edit managed task's responsible person, marker type and description

__Available Since:__ 1.0

get.description:
Returns managed task by given jobId(job manager's job id)

__Available Since:__ 1.0

does not have any markers assigned, then the return is empty.

put.description:
Update marker types. Image can be replaced as base64 string. File type must be provided along with the base64 string.

__Available Since:__ 3.3

application/json.example:
[ {
  "predefined" : true,
  "categoryId" : 1,
  "base64File" : "Here comes the base64 string",
  "active" : false,
  "fileType" : "image/png",
  "name" : "Test"
} ]

post.description:
Create new marker types. Image is attached as base64 string. File type must be provided along with the base64 string.

__Available Since:__ 3.3

delete.description:
Delete marker type. Multiple ids can be provided in the form ?markerIds=<xxx>&markerIds=<yyy>&...

If there is no creator in response, this means that the user is deleted.

This method deletes a planning element with all children and all associations like
attachments, bills, markers, etc.

__Available Since:__ 1.0

If the dates extend parent node, it will be resized automatically. For nodeTypeId property see NodeTypeRestApi#getNodeTypes().

__Available Since:__ 1.0

post.description:
Create node or child node. For nodeTypeId property see NodeTypeRestApi#getNodeTypes().
If type is not specified or is wrong, default type 'Standard' will be used.
If the dates extend parent node, it will be resized automatically.To set node as never expire : 9999-12-31

__Available Since:__ 1.0

get.description: __Available Since:__ 1.0

parameters.name: withAdditionalInfo
parameters.description: not required. If param exists with return NodeDetailsDTO

get.description:
Return Node information.Set withAdditionalInfo to true if you want to get additional information about the node, like externalId, currency, description, responsible person.

__Available Since:__ 1.0
__Available Since:__ 1.0

Return deeplink for calendar and budget views

__Available Since:__ 1.0

post.description:
Copy node to parent. If there is exceed between the copied node and parent node dates, @param resizeType will be used.

__Available Since:__ 1.0

parameters.name: resizeType
parameters.description: not required. Default is extendParent(extend dates of parent). If presented value "shrinkChild" will shrink the dates of child

application/json.example:
{
  "copyTimelines" : true,
  "copyTasks" : true,
  "copyMarkers" : true,
  "copyAttachments" : true,
  "copyInvoices" : true,
  "copySunkCosts" : true,
  "copyBudgets" : true,
  "copySunkCostBills" : true,
  "copyPlanTarget" : true,
  "copyDimensions" : true,
  "copyKpis" : true,
  "copyGeneralInfo" : true,
  "copyFees" : true
}

post.description:
Move node to parent. If there is exceed between the copied node and parent node dates, @param resizeType will be used.

__Available Since:__ 3.4

parameters.name: afterNodeId
parameters.description: not required. After which node to move the node that is moved. Default is at first position of the parent

parameters.name: resizeType
parameters.description: not required. Default is extendParent(extend dates of parent). If presented value "shrinkChild" will shrink the dates of child

get.description:
This method provides a list with information about all tasks in Marketing Planner. Each
revision returns max. 500 tasks. Use the revision parameter several times obtain
information on all all tasks. The revision parameter can be also used as a history
parameter to return tasks which have been modified or deleted since the last given
version.

__Available Since:__ 1.0

Returns the tasks of the user where the user is assigned like responsible user

Returns all elements that a user is watching

SearchCriteriaDTO.title: SearchCriteriaDTO
SearchCriteriaDTO.description:
search criterias types for search : TIME_LINE, NODE, TASK, INVOICE, ATTACHMENT, SUNK_COST, DIMENSION_VALUE
treeid: in which year to execute search. If treeId is NULL will execute for all years.

Sort.title: Sort
Sort.description:
Sort option for queries. You have to provide at least a list of properties to sort for that must not include
null or empty strings. The direction defaults to Sort#DEFAULT_DIRECTION.

SortResource.title: SortResource
SortResource.description:
Sort option for queries. You have to provide at least a list of properties to sort for that must not include
null or empty strings. The direction defaults to Sort#DEFAULT_DIRECTION.
